text: Caged Heat, also known as Renegade Girls, is a 1974 prison action drama movie directed by first time director Jonathan Demme and stars Erica Gavin, Roberta Collins, Barbara Steele. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1974 action movies Category:1974 crime drama movies Category:1974 LGBT movies Category:American action movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Jonathan Demme
title: Caged Heat
